column1: Experimental details for all E. coli samples analzed in this study including growth rate, harvesting conditions, OD-values and number of identified proteins

column8: # of doublings at exponential growth before harvesting

column1: 1) Volume calculated for all growth conditions according to Volkmer, B. & Heinemann, M. Condition-dependent cell volume and concentration of Escherichia coli to facilitate data conversion for systems biology modeling. PLoS ONE 6, e23126 (2011).
2) Proteins identified in all 3 biological triplicates were combined for each condition and strain
3) The NaCl amound added (see methods) was likely only sufficient to exerted a mild osmotic stress
